universitySubjects.name: Informatyka
universitySubjects.recrutationFormula: max(maths_primary * 0.4, maths_extended) + max(physics_extended, computerScience_extended) + (0.1 * max(polish_primary * 0.4, polish_extended)) + (0.1 * max(english_primary * 0.4, english_extended))  + min(exams, 30)

universitySubjects.name: Informatyka
universitySubjects.recrutationFormula: 0.5 * polish_primary + 0.5 * english_primary + 2.5 * (maths_primary + maths_extended) + max(2 * ((0.3 * inf02_primary + 0.7 * inf02_extended) + (0.3 * inf03_primary + 0.7 * inf03_extended)), 2 * ((selection_extended > 29 ? (0.5 * selection_extended + 50) :  (2 * selection_extended)) + selection_extended))

universitySubjects.name: Artifical Intelligence
universitySubjects.recrutationFormula: 0.5 * polish_primary + 0.5 * english_primary + 2.5 * (maths_primary + maths_extended) + max(2 * ((0.3 * inf02_primary + 0.7 * inf02_extended) + (0.3 * inf03_primary + 0.7 * inf03_extended)), 2 * ((selection_extended > 29 ? (0.5 * selection_extended + 50) :  (2 * selection_extended)) + selection_extended))

universitySubjects.name: Informatyka
universitySubjects.recrutationFormula: g(x) = x < 30 ? x : x <= 80 ? x + 2 * (x - 30) : x + 100; 2 * maths_primary + 3 * g(maths_extended) + g(selection_extended)

universitySubjects.name: Cyberbezpieczeństwo
universitySubjects.recrutationFormula: 2 * maths_primary + 3 * (maths_extended < 30 ? maths_extended : maths_extended <= 80 ? maths_extended + 2 * (maths_extended - 30) : maths_extended + 100) + (selection_extended < 30 ? selection_extended : selection_extended <= 80 ? selection_extended + 2 * (selection_extended - 30) : selection_extended + 100)

universitySubjects.name: Informatyka i Systemy Inteligentne
universitySubjects.recrutationFormula: g(x) = x < 30 ? x : x <= 80 ? x + 2 * (x - 30) : x + 100;  max(selection_extended, maths_extended); avg(x, y) = ceil((x + y) / 2); 2 * maths_primary + 3 * g(max(selection_extended, maths_extended)) + g(max(selection_extended, maths_extended, avg(inf02_primary, inf02_extended), avg(inf03_primary, inf03_extended)))

universitySubjects.name: Cyberbezpieczeństwo
universitySubjects.recrutationFormula: p(primary, extended) = max(primary, primary + 1.5 * extended, 2.5 * extended); z = (0.3*inf02_primary + 0.7 * inf02_extended + 0.3 * inf03_primary + 0.7 * inf03_extended) / 2; p(maths_primary, maths_extended) + max(0.5 * z, 2.5 * selection_extended) + 0.1 * p(english_primary, english_extended) + 0.1 * max(polish_primary, polish_extended)

universitySubjects.recrutationFormula: p(primary, extended) = max(primary, primary + 1.5 * extended, 2.5 * extended); z = (0.3*inf02_primary + 0.7 * inf02_extended + 0.3 * inf03_primary + 0.7 * inf03_extended) / 2; p(maths_primary, maths_extended) + max(0.5 * z, 2.5 * selection_extended) + 0.1 * p(english_primary, english_extended) + 0.1 * max(polish_primary, polish_extended)

universitySubjects.name: Informatyka algorytmiczna
universitySubjects.recrutationFormula: p(primary, extended) = max(primary, primary + 1.5 * extended, 2.5 * extended); p(maths_primary, maths_extended) + 2.5 * selection_extended + 0.1 * p(english_primary, english_extended) + 0.1 * max(polish_primary, polish_extended)
